attributes.action: ban the sale of clothes below size 8 in shops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teenagers are constantly being pressured to be thin. personally, i think it is disgusting that shops are selling clothes that are a size 4 which are aimed at teenage girls. the longer this goes on the closer young girls will be getting to size 0.
